results.title: Dry eye disease in patients with type II diabetes mellitus: A retrospective, population-based cohort study in Taiwan
results.text_hl: @GENE_GLP1R @GENE_2740 @@@GLP-1@@@ agonist, SGLT-2 inhibitor, DPP4 inhibitor, and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ are superior to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ alone in preventing @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Dry_Eye_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015352 @@@DED@@@.

results.title: Dry eyes in patients with diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: A multivariate linear regression showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use was the only independent variable associated with @<m>DISEASE_Dry_Eye_Syndromes</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015352 @@@dry eyes@@@.
